按上下方向键切换所选语言，按“q”键保存并返回上一级设置。: Press up or down arrow key to change the language you have chosen, press 'q' key to save and return to the previous setting.
按上下方向键切换语言，\n按“q”键保存所选语言并退出语言设置。:
Press up or down arrow key to change the language,
press 'q' key to save the language you have chosen and quit the language setting.
如需启动游戏，可输入“python3 {}”并按Enter键。: If you want to start the game, type "python3 {}" and press the Enter key.
欢迎来到扫雷。\n按上下方向键选择操作，按Enter键执行所选操作。:
Welcome to the minesweeper.
Press up or down arrow key to choose an operation,
Press Enter key to execute the operation you have chosen.
按上下键切换所选设置，按Enter键打开所选设置，按“q”键退出设置。: Press up or down key to change the setting you have chosen, press Enter key to open the setting you have chosen, press 'q' key to quit the settings.
按“q”键退出该页面。: Press 'q' key to quit this page.
按上下方向键切换要查看排行榜的模式，按“h”键切换用时显示方式，按“q”键退出排: Press up or down arrow key to change the mode you want to view the records of, Press 'h' key to change display mode of elapsed time, press 'q' key to quit the records.
按左右方向键切换所选方案，按“q”键保存并返回上一级设置。: Press left or right arrow key to change the solution, press 'q' key to save and return to the previous setting.
翻开3x3范围内格子: Check blocks which are in the 3x3 area
按左右方向键切换按键方案，\n按“q”键保存所选键位方案并退出键位设置。\n请记:
Press left or right arrow key to change key solution,
press 'q' key to save the key solution you have chosen and quit the key setting.
Please remember the current key solution.
按上下方向键选择所玩模式，按空格键可锁定模式。\n“自定义”模式可以自定义地图大:
Press up or down arrow key to choose the mode you want to play, press space key to lock the mode.
You can set map size and mine num on your own in "Custom" mode,
the "Lock mode" option determines whether to return to the mode selection screen when restarting the game.'
请输入地图宽度、高度和雷数。\n按Tab键切换输入项。\n按Enter键确认输入:
Please enter the width of the map, the height of the map and the mine num.
Press Tab key to change the input item.
Press Enter key to comfirm the map attributes you have entered.
The "Lock mode" option determines whether to return to the mode selection screen when restarting the game.
地图符号：\n #：未翻开的格子。\n 空格：已翻开的格子:
Map symbols:
            #: The covers.
       Spaces: The blank blocks.
            *: Mines.
Numbers (1-9): The num of mines which are in 8 blocks in the 3x3 area except the current block.
            F: Flags.
请按上下方向键选择模式，\n按空格键选择是否锁定该模式，\n按“q”键退出该界面:
Please press up or down arrow key to choose a mode,
press space key to decide whether you lock the mode,
press 'q' key to quit this page.
请输入地图信息，\n按Tab键切换输入项，\n按Enter键确认输入信息，\n按:
Please enter the attributes of the map,
press Tab key to change input option,
press Enter key to comfirm attributes you have entered,
press space key to decide whether you lock the mode,
press 'q' key to quit this page.
地图宽度：[{width}](1-{max_width})\n地图高度：[{he:
The width of the map: [{width}](1-{max_width})
The height of the map: [{height}](1-{max_height})
The num of mines: [{mine_num}](1-{max_mine_num})
你的雷数超出地图大小。请重新输入。: Your mine num is exceeds the map size. Please enter it again.
抱歉，该游戏出现错误。是否重新启动游戏？(y/n): Sorry, the game happens some mistakes. Restart the game? (y/n)
按上下方向键切换要查看排行榜的模式，\n按“h”键切换用时显示方式，\n按“q”:
Press up or down arrow key to change the mode you want to view,
press 'h' key to change the format of elapsed time,
press 'q' key to quit the records page.
欢迎来到扫雷游戏教程。按Enter键进入教程，按“q”键退出教程。: Welcome to the minesweeper game tutorial. Press Enter key to enter the tutorial, press 'q' key to quit the tutorial.
按左右方向键切换所选方案，按“q”键返回上一级设置。: Press left or right arrow key to change the key soluation, press 'q' key to return to the previous setting.
为了更好地畅玩扫雷，建议你查看键位设置。\n是否现在打开键位设置？(y/n):
In order to play the minesweeper better, I suggest you view the key setting.
Open the key setting now? (y/n)
你的选择错误。请按“y”或“n”。: Your choice is invaild. Please press 'y' or 'n'.
如果忘记键位或想切换键位方案，可按{}打开设置。: If you forget the key or want to change the key solution, press {} to open the settings.
你插旗太多了，电摇你！: You have flagged too many blocks, what a pity!
抱歉，该游戏出现错误。是否重新启动游戏？(y/n): Sorry, the game happens some mistakes. Restart the game? (y/n)
游戏已暂停。按“{}”键以继续游戏。: The game is paused. Press "{}" key to continue the game.
